list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements, the achievements of those with whom one is closely associated, or from qualities or possessions that are widely admired.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the team was bursting with pride after recording a sensational victory
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đội đã bùng nổ với niềm tự hào sau khi ghi lại một chiến thắng giật gân

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he swallowed his pride and asked for help
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh nuốt niềm tự hào của mình và yêu cầu sự giúp đỡ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: confidence and self-respect as expressed by members of a group, typically one that has been socially marginalized, on the basis of their shared identity, culture, and experience.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bridge was lit up in rainbow colors, symbolic of LGBT pride
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cây cầu được thắp sáng trong màu sắc cầu vồng, tượng trưng cho niềm tự hào LGBT

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the best state or condition of something; the prime.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong niềm tự hào của tuổi trẻ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group of lions forming a social unit.
be especially proud of (a particular quality or skill).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she'd always prided herself on her ability to deal with a crisis
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy luôn tự hào với khả năng đối phó với một cuộc khủng hoảng
